definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Four vaccine candidates should be at the same stage of testing.
sentences.chinese: 四個備選疫苗也應進入同樣的試驗期。

sentences.english: Knows about some alternatives to popular and standard tools.
sentences.chinese: 知道一些流行和標準工具的備選方案。

sentences.english: So what's the alternative to standalone spreadsheets?
sentences.chinese: 那麼單機版電子表格的備選方案是什麼？

sentences.english: Clothes hook is not furnished; available as optional accessory.
sentences.chinese: 不配置衣帽鉤，但可作爲備選附件選配。

sentences.english: To run the script, you have several alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 要運行腳本，您需有幾個備選方案。

sentences.english: so they don’t take inv space. but apparently you an only hold 10 you’re not using.
sentences.chinese: 他們不佔據背囊空位，但你只能攜帶10個備選。

sentences.english: Constructed of hardened materials with optional hard facing.
sentences.chinese: 有硬化材料構造而成，配置備選硬麪。

sentences.english: Certain alternative products have been very effective for many people.
sentences.chinese: 特定的備選藥物對許多患者效果顯著。

sentences.english: A short announcement on his website said the campaign was now getting underway.
sentences.chinese: 一份簡短的公告在他網站上稱備選活動正漸漸展開。

sentences.english: For vertical installations use optional elbows as shown below.
sentences.chinese: 對於垂直安裝，採用如下圖所示的備選彎頭。

sentences.english: The best advice Brady said is to devise a plan B.
sentences.chinese: 布拉迪給出的最好建議就是準備一套備選方案。

sentences.english: Should I include alternative solutions to the one I’m offering? (p.
sentences.chinese: 在提供方案的同時，是否應該提供一個備選方案？

sentences.english: Sometimes, plan B is pretty good.
sentences.chinese: 有時，備選方案也毫不遜色。

sentences.english: Goalkeeper Amelia was the third choice shot-stopper in Marcello Lippi's World Cup party.
sentences.chinese: 在裏皮的世界盃軍團中，阿梅利亞是三號備選門將。

sentences.english: And so we looked at some alternatives the other day.
sentences.chinese: 因此，幾天前我們關注了一些備選方案。

sentences.english: "She can do as my alternative?" Zhao asked the old stand in the door wearing.
sentences.chinese: “她可以作爲我的備選嗎？”趙海站在房門問老戴。
